title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 502.7 - Coordination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 502.7 - Coordination

State Regulations

State agencies undertaking any project pursuant to this

Part shall ensure that reviews thereunder are coordinated with those of
appropriate environmental impact statements, project notification and review
systems, and State capital construction funding requests. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
502.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
